user.title: Smart Climate Control Setup
user.description: Configure your Smart Climate Control integration

data_description.climate_entity: Select the climate entity you want to control
data_description.room_sensor: Select the temperature sensor for the room
data_description.outdoor_sensor: Select an outdoor temperature sensor for better predictions
data_description.power_sensor: Select a power sensor to detect when the AC is running
data_description.max_offset: Maximum temperature offset to apply (safety limit)
data_description.min_temperature: Minimum temperature the system can set
data_description.max_temperature: Maximum temperature the system can set
data_description.update_interval: How often to update the offset calculation
data_description.ml_enabled: Enable machine learning for better offset predictions
data_description.away_temperature: Fixed temperature to maintain when Away mode is active
data_description.sleep_offset: Additional temperature offset applied during Sleep/Night mode for quieter operation
data_description.boost_offset: Aggressive cooling offset applied during Boost mode (negative value)
data_description.gradual_adjustment_rate: Maximum temperature change per update cycle to prevent oscillation
data_description.feedback_delay: Time to wait after temperature adjustment before recording learning feedback
data_description.enable_learning: Enable the lightweight learning system to improve offset predictions over time
data_description.power_idle_threshold: Power consumption below this value indicates the AC is idle or off
data_description.power_min_threshold: Power consumption below this value indicates the AC is running at minimum capacity
data_description.power_max_threshold: Power consumption above this value indicates the AC is running at high capacity
data_description.default_target_temperature: Initial temperature setting when wrapped entity has no target temperature or is unavailable
data_description.enable_retry: Enable automatic retry when sensors are unavailable during Home Assistant startup
data_description.max_retry_attempts: Maximum number of retry attempts before giving up (1-10)
data_description.initial_timeout: Time to wait before first retry attempt (30-300 seconds)
data_description.save_interval: How frequently to save learning data to disk (300-86400 seconds, default 3600 = 1 hour)
data_description.adaptive_delay: Automatically adjust feedback delay timing based on AC response patterns
data_description.forecast_enabled: Enable predictive temperature adjustments based on weather forecast data
data_description.weather_entity: Select a weather entity to provide forecast data for predictive adjustments
data_description.heat_wave_temp_threshold: Temperature threshold to trigger heat wave pre-cooling strategy (20-40°C)
data_description.heat_wave_min_duration_hours: Minimum duration of high temperatures to trigger heat wave strategy (1-24 hours)
data_description.heat_wave_lookahead_hours: How far ahead to check forecast for heat wave conditions (1-72 hours)
data_description.heat_wave_pre_action_hours: How many hours before heat wave to start pre-cooling (1-12 hours)
data_description.heat_wave_adjustment: Temperature adjustment for heat wave pre-cooling (negative values for cooling, -5.0 to 0.0°C)
data_description.clear_sky_condition: Weather condition to trigger clear sky pre-cooling strategy
data_description.clear_sky_min_duration_hours: Minimum duration of clear conditions to trigger strategy (1-24 hours)
data_description.clear_sky_lookahead_hours: How far ahead to check forecast for clear conditions (1-48 hours)
data_description.clear_sky_pre_action_hours: How many hours before clear conditions to start pre-cooling (1-6 hours)
data_description.clear_sky_adjustment: Temperature adjustment for clear sky pre-cooling (negative values for cooling, -3.0 to 0.0°C)
